Text: Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper We received notification that the th segment to gate valve providing a total firm capacity of Mdthday was approved by FERC today Based on the feedback some of you have provided today and since this is late notice on a Friday afternoon the contracts will be effective on Monday October but the capacity will be available tomorrow and Sunday We filed the th segment to gate valve this past Tuesday October and are prepared to file the final segment as soon as one currently being reviewed is approved Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper Yesterday we filed with FERC for approval of the fifth tiein segment to gate contracted for Mdthday This will bring the firm capacity of the Medicine Bow system to Mdthday We will notify you as soon as we have approval Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper This morning we received FERC approval for the fourth tiein segment to gate contracted for Mdthday This brings the firm capacity of the Medicine Bow system to Mdthday The contract effective date will be October but you will be able to utilize this capacity as soon as we have it set up in the system today Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper This morning we received FERC approval for the third tiein segment to gate contracted for Mdthday The contract effective date will be October but you will be able to utilize this capacity as soon as we have it set up in the system today Additionally we filed for approval of the next segment to gate yesterday and will notify you once we have approval Please call me if you have any questions today or call Craig Coombs at tomorrow or Friday as I will be out those days back in the office Monday Laine Lobban This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper Based on your concerns and requests for additional notice prior to commissioning each additional segment we are adopting the following procedure for placing segments in service We will notify you when we have filed each segment with FERC for approval Based on our experience with the tieins to date we are now anticipating days for approval Upon receiving FERC approval we will notify you of the contract in service date for that segment of capacity The contract will start at the later of the following dates two days following the date of FERC approval days following filing with FERC or at least one week following the last in service date For example we officially filed for the second segment approval Mdthday September today and anticipate filing the next segment Mdthday on October If we receive FERC approval tomorrow we will notify you but the contract will not become effective until Sept However you would have additional capacity available a couple days early at Hopefully the above procedure will help you to plan for your nominations by providing more flexability and notice for each additional commissioning Please call me to discuss or with any questions Laine Lobban This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper We do not anticipate FERC approval of the second tiein until later today so WIC is revising the schedule for contract in service as set forth below We will notify you if there are any further delays Judy Warhover will be sending a replacement page reflecting the revised dates early next week Please call with any questions or concerns Capacity Contract InService Original Dates Mdthd Sep Sep Aug Sep Approved Sep Oct Sep Sep Expected Oct Oct Sep Sep Oct Oct Sep Sep Oct Oct Oct Oct Oct Oct Oct Oct Nov Nov Oct Nov Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper This morning WIC requested authorization from the FERC to place the Medicine Bow Loop project pipeline and compression into service We requested and anticipate approval next week and assuming that approval the project will be placed in service late next week Under the terms of your Medicine Bow Loop contracts the reservation rates and your initial first month MDQs will become effective December I will update you on any developments and notify you when we have received and accepted the approval requested above For Medicine Bow Lateral Shippers your MDQs will proceed as set forth in your contracts and you will see a reduction in your rate for November to cents per dth to reflect total MDQs exceeding Mdthday and for December to cents per dth to reflect the Medicine Bow Loop inservice Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper We received notification that the th segment to gate valve providing a total firm capacity of Mdthday was approved by FERC today Based on the feedback some of you have provided today and since this is late notice on a Friday afternoon the contracts will be effective on Monday October but the capacity will be available tomorrow and Sunday We filed the th segment to gate valve this past Tuesday October and are prepared to file the final segment as soon as one currently being reviewed is approved Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow Loop Approved by FERC Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper Yesterday the FERC authorized WIC to placed the entire Medicine Bow Loop and compression into service WIC will have the contracts in the system and ready to accept nominations on Thursday November for transportation on Friday November Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Recall Medicine Bow Loop Approved by FERC Cc Lobban Laine would like to recall the message Medicine Bow Loop Approved by FERC This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow Loop Approved by FERC Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper Yesterday the FERC authorized WIC to placed the entire Medicine Bow Loop and compression into service WIC will place the facilities into service on Friday November Under the terms of your Loop FTSAs the reservation charges for your initial MDQs will become effective December You will continue to nominate and transport under your existing Medicine Bow Loop tiein Capacity contracts through November and those contracts will expire on December when the Medicine Bow Loop contract MDQs become effective Should you wish to transport under the Loop contracts prior to December it will be as overrun service Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Cc Dear Medicine Bow Shipper We received notification that the th segment to gate valve providing a total firm capacity of Mdthday was approved by FERC yesterday and is available for transport The contract effective date for this additional capacity will be on Monday November We plan on filing the request for the final segment of additional contacted capacity to gate valve today or Monday Based on conversations with many of you it appears the Mdthday of additional Mdthday total capacity on Medicine Bow provided by this last segment commissioning will be sufficient to accomodate your transportation requirements until the entire project goes into service anticipated late this month For the month of October the capacity contracted was approximatly utilized and we anticipate even greater utilization for November While a few of you have mentioned possibly having production in excess of your contract it appears that the remaining shippers will have underutilized capacity and no additional capacity will be necessary until the Loop goes in service Following the last segment approval notice I will continue to update you on the progress and timing for the entire Loop inservice for your information and planning Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

FW Medicine Bow TieIn CapacityMark Whitt asked that you be included on these notices I will put you on the distribution list Original Message From Lobban Laine Sent Thursday October PM To Cc Coombs Craig Zinko Don Price Tom Wood Sally Warhover Judy Saye Steven Dalene Scott Gerlich Peter Hutton Tarry Koerner Steve Tomlinson Robert T Harris Roland Cook Mark Palazzari Catherine Westhoff Mark Riter Maureen Subject Medicine Bow TieIn Capacity Dear Medicine Bow Shipper Yesterday we filed with FERC for approval of the fifth tiein segment to gate contracted for Mdthday This will bring the firm capacity of the Medicine Bow system to Mdthday We will notify you as soon as we have approval Please call me if you have any questions Laine Lobban cell This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
